thread.title: Attention, world: Chrissy Teigen and John Legend's daughter has uttered her first word
thread.title_full: Attention, world: Chrissy Teigen and John Legend's daughter has uttered her first word

author: Martha Tesema
title: Attention, world: Chrissy Teigen and John Legend's daughter has uttered her first word
text:
When two very important people have a kid, it's safe to assume that the first words will be brilliant. I'm here to report that Luna, daughter of Chrissy Teigen and John Legend , has thankfully not disappointed us at all.
Teigen shared her daughter's precious attempt at communicating with the world in an adorable Instagram video. Spoiler alert: she succeeds.
SEE ALSO: John Legend is proud of Chrissy Teigen's 'powerful' essay on her struggle with postpartum depression
"Ah!!! So many firsts," Teigen captioned the video, in which she and Legend coach the little human on how to say "cat."
Ah!!! So many firsts
A post shared by chrissy teigen (@chrissyteigen) on Mar 20, 2017 at 6:38am PDT
"Cat" to you too, Luna.
WATCH: ‘Beauty and the Beast’ cast tell us their characters’ musical guilty pleasure
